achievements.name: To Aedirn!
achievements.description: Complete Chapter 1.

achievements.name: Alea Iacta Est
achievements.description: Complete Chapter 2.

achievements.name: Once Ain't Enough
achievements.description: Complete Chapter 3.

achievements.name: Apprentice
achievements.description: Use alchemy to brew five potions or oils.

achievements.name: Master Alchemist
achievements.description: Acquire the Mutant ability.

achievements.name: Avenger
achievements.description: Finish the game by killing Letho.

achievements.name: The Butcher of Blaviken
achievements.description: Kill 500 foes.

achievements.name: Miser
achievements.description: Collect 10000 orens.

achievements.name: Focus
achievements.description: Perform three successful ripostes in a row.

achievements.name: Craftsman
achievements.description: Hire a craftsman to create an item.

achievements.name: Pest Control
achievements.description: Finish all quests involing the destruction of monster nests.

achievements.name: Backbone
achievements.description: Craft a suit of armor from elements of the kayran's carapace.

achievements.name: Being Witcher George
achievements.description: Kill the dragon.

achievements.name: Fat Man
achievements.description: Kill the draug.

achievements.name: Torn Asunder!
achievements.description: Kill more than one opponent using a single exploding bomb.

achievements.name: Gambler
achievements.description: Win an arm wrestling match, a dice poker game and a fist fight.

achievements.name: Gladiator
achievements.description: Defeat all opponents in the Kaedweni arena.

achievements.name: Eagle Eye
achievements.description: Hit Count Etcheverry using the ballista.

achievements.name: Heartbreaker
achievements.description: Seduce Ves.

achievements.name: Madman
achievements.description: Finish the game while playing at the Dark difficulty level.

achievements.name: Kingmaker
achievements.description: Help Roche rescue Anais from the Kaedweni camp.

achievements.name: Dragonheart
achievements.description: Spare or save Saskia.

achievements.name: Journeyman
achievements.description: Achieve character level 10.

achievements.name: Guru
achievements.description: Achieve character level 35.

achievements.name: Librarian
achievements.description: Find all additional information about the insane asylum's history.

achievements.name: Master of Magic
achievements.description: Acquire the Sense of Magic ability.

achievements.name: Mutant!
achievements.description: Enhance abilities using mutagens at least five times.

achievements.name: Necromancer
achievements.description: Relive all of Auckes's memories in Dethmold's vision.

achievements.name: Old Friends
achievements.description: Finish the game by sparing Letho.

achievements.name: Last Man Standing
achievements.description: Survive your 30th fight in the Arena

achievements.name: Perfectionist
achievements.description: Kill 10 foes in a row without losing any Vitality.

achievements.name: Poker!
achievements.description: Roll five-of-a-kind at dice poker.

achievements.name: Tried-and-True
achievements.description: Survive your 5th fight in the Arena

achievements.name: The Fugitive
achievements.description: Complete the Prologue.

achievements.name: Ricochet
achievements.description: Kill a foe by deflecting his own arrow at him.

achievements.name: Sensitive Guy
achievements.description: Save Síle from dying in the unstable portal.

achievements.name: Intimidator
achievements.description: Intimidate someone.

achievements.name: Man of the Shadows
achievements.description: Successfully sneak through Loredo's garden and find the component of the kayran trap.

achievements.name: Black Ops
achievements.description: Sneak through the lower camp without raising the alarm.

achievements.name: Spellbreaker
achievements.description: Help Iorveth find the dagger needed to free Saskia from the spell that holds her.

achievements.name: Reasons of State
achievements.description: Stop Roche from killing Henselt.

achievements.name: Swordmaster
achievements.description: Acquire the Combat Acumen ability.

achievements.name: Kayranslayer
achievements.description: Kill the kayran.

achievements.name: Artful Dodger
achievements.description: Cut off a tentacle using the kayran trap.

achievements.name: To Be Continued…
achievements.description: Finish the game at any difficulty level.

achievements.name: Tourist
achievements.description: Tour the camp with Zyvik.

achievements.name: Threesome
achievements.description: Kill three foes at once by performing a group finisher.

achievements.name: Friend of Trolls
achievements.description: Spare all trolls in the game.

achievements.name: Trollslayer
achievements.description: Kill all the trolls in the game.

achievements.name: Witch Hunter
achievements.description: Leave Síle to die in the unstable portal.

achievements.name: Lilac and Gooseberries
achievements.description: Find Yennefer of Vengerberg.

achievements.name: A Friend in Need
achievements.description: Find and free Dandelion.

achievements.name: Necromancer
achievements.description: Help Yennefer extract information from Skjall's body.

achievements.name: Family Counselor
achievements.description: Find the baron's wife and daughter.

achievements.name: Something More
achievements.description: Find Ciri.

achievements.name: Xenonaut
achievements.description: Visit Tir ná Lia and convince Ge'els to betray Eredin.

achievements.name: The King is Dead
achievements.description: Defeat Eredin.

achievements.name: Passed the Trial
achievements.description: Finish the game on any difficulty.

achievements.name: Ran the Gauntlet
achievements.description: Finish the game on the "Blood and Broken Bones!" or "Death March!" difficulty levels.

achievements.name: Walked the Path
achievements.description: Finish the game on the "Death March!" difficulty level.

achievements.name: Geralt: The Professional
achievements.description: Complete all witcher contracts.

achievements.name: Kingmaker
achievements.description: Complete the subplot about choosing Skellige's ruler.

achievements.name: Assassin of Kings
achievements.description: Take part in the assassination of King Radovid.

achievements.name: Friends With Benefits
achievements.description: Complete the subplot involving Keira Metz.

achievements.name: Full Crew
achievements.description: Bring all possible allies to Kaer Morhen for the battle against the Hunt.

achievements.name: Dendrologist
achievements.description: Acquire all the Abilities in one tree.

achievements.name: The Enemy of My Enemy
achievements.description: Use the Axii Sign to force one opponent to kill another. Do this 20 times.

achievements.name: Humpty Dumpty
achievements.description: Kill 10 opponents by knocking them off somewhere high with the Aard Sign.

achievements.name: Environmentally Unfriendly
achievements.description: Kill 50 opponents using the environment (e.g. swamp gas, insects or objects).

achievements.name: Kaer Morhen Trained
achievements.description: Perform 10 effective counterattacks in a row without getting hit or parrying.

achievements.name: Can't Touch This!
achievements.description: Kill 5 foes in a fight without taking damage (except for Toxicity) and without using the Quen Sign.

achievements.name: That Is the Evilest Thing…
achievements.description: Ignite the gas produced by a Dragon's Dream bomb using a burning opponent. Do this 10 times.

achievements.name: Butcher of Blaviken
achievements.description: Kill at least 5 opponents in under 10 seconds.

achievements.name: Triple Threat
achievements.description: Kill 3 opponents in one fight using 3 different methods (swords, bombs, crossbow, Signs, etc.).

achievements.name: Brawler
achievements.description: Defeat Olaf, the Skellige champion of unarmed combat.

achievements.name: Overkill
achievements.description: Make an opponent suffer from bleeding, poisoning and burning simultaneously. Do this 10 times.

achievements.name: Master Marksman
achievements.description: Kill 50 human and nonhuman opponents by striking them in the head with a crossbow bolt.

achievements.name: What Was That?
achievements.description: Attack, counter, cast a Sign and throw a bomb (in any order) in under 4 seconds.

achievements.name: Globetrotter
achievements.description: Discover 100 fast travel points.

achievements.name: Pest Control
achievements.description: Destroy all monster nests in the Velen / Novigrad region, or in Skellige.

achievements.name: Card Collector
achievements.description: Acquire all gwent cards available in the base version of the game.

achievements.name: Gwent Master
achievements.description: Defeat Tybalt and win the gwent tournament held at the Passiflora.

achievements.name: Let's Cook!
achievements.description: Learn 12 potion formulae.

achievements.name: Bombardier
achievements.description: Collect the formulae for 6 different bomb types.

achievements.name: Bookworm
achievements.description: Read 30 books, journals or other documents.

achievements.name: Armed and Dangerous
achievements.description: Find and equip all the elements of one set of witcher gear.

achievements.name: Power Overwhelming
achievements.description: Have all possible Place of Power bonuses active at the same time.

achievements.name: Brawl Master
achievements.description: Complete all fistfighting quests in Velen, Skellige and Novigrad.

achievements.name: Fast and Furious
achievements.description: Win all the horse races in the game.

achievements.name: Munchkin
achievements.description: Reach character development level 35.

achievements.name: Fire in the Hole
achievements.description: Destroy 10 monster nests using bombs.

achievements.name: Fist of the South Star
achievements.description: Defeat an opponent in a fistfight without taking any damage.

achievements.name: Geralt and Friends
achievements.description: Win a round of gwent using only neutral cards.

achievements.name: All In
achievements.description: Play three hero cards in one round of gwent and win the match.

achievements.name: Shrieker
achievements.description: Complete the contract on the shrieker.

achievements.name: Fearless Vampire Slayer
achievements.description: Complete the contract on Sarasti.

achievements.name: Woodland Spirit
achievements.description: Complete the contract on the Woodland Spirit.

achievements.name: Fiend or Foe?
achievements.description: Complete the contract on Morvudd.

achievements.name: Ashes to Ashes
achievements.description: Complete the contract on Therazane.

achievements.name: The Doppler Effect
achievements.description: Resolve the doppler problem in Novigrad.

achievements.name: Even Odds
achievements.description: Kill 2 monsters you have a contract on without using Signs, potions, mutagens, oils or bombs.

achievements.name: Mutant
achievements.description: Fill all mutagen slots.

achievements.name: Killed It
achievements.description: Win a round of gwent with a total strength of at least 187.

achievements.name: I'm Not Kissing That
achievements.description: Kill the prince cursed into a toad.

achievements.name: Let the Good Times Roll!
achievements.description: Participate in all the activities at the wedding.

achievements.name: Shopaholic
achievements.description: Buy all the items put on the block at the Borsodis' Auction House.

achievements.name: Curator of Nightmares
achievements.description: Recreate all of Iris' nightmares in the Painted World.

achievements.name: Pacta Sunt Servanda
achievements.description: Finish the "Hearts of Stone" expansion.

achievements.name: When It's Many Against One…
achievements.description: Provoke all Iris von Everec's Nightmares into fighting you at the same time and defeat them.

achievements.name: Return to Sender
achievements.description: Kill 3 opponents with their own arrows.

achievements.name: Can Quit Anytime I Want
achievements.description: Be under the influence of seven potions or decoctions at the same time.

achievements.name: Wild Rose Dethorned
achievements.description: Defeat all the fallen knights and loot their campsites.

achievements.name: I Wore Ofieri Before It Was Cool
achievements.description: Collect all available Ofieri armor and horse gear, and at least one Ofieri sword.

achievements.name: Moo-rderer
achievements.description: Kill 20 cows.

achievements.name: Rad Steez, Bro!
achievements.description: Slide downhill uninterrupted for at least 10 seconds.

achievements.name: The Witcher's Gone South
achievements.description: Travel to the Duchy of Toussaint.

achievements.name: Last Action Hero
achievements.description: Be decorated with the Order of Vitis Vinifera.

achievements.name: Kling of the Clink
achievements.description: Serve time in Toussaint.

achievements.name: A Knight to Remember
achievements.description: Obtain a flawless victory in all the competitions during the knights' tourney.

achievements.name: Embodiment of the Five Virtues
achievements.description: Be given Aerondight by the Lady of the Lake.

achievements.name: Playing House
achievements.description: Use all available options for developing Corvo Bianco.

achievements.name: Turned Every Stone
achievements.description: Find all grandmaster diagrams for each witcher school.

achievements.name: I Have a Gwent Problem
achievements.description: Collect all the cards in the Skellige deck.

achievements.name: The Grapes of Wrath Stomped
achievements.description: Help unite the warring vineyards and have a wine named in your honor.

achievements.name: Dressed to Kill
achievements.description: Unlock the bonus for equipping all the witcher gear elements from one School.

achievements.name: Weapon "W
achievements.description: Develop a mutation.

achievements.name: Hasta la Vista™
achievements.description: Kill a frozen opponent with a crossbow bolt.

achievements.name: David and Golyat
achievements.description: Kill Golyat with a crossbow bolt to his eye.

achievements.name: The Fool
achievements.description: Become a mercenary.

achievements.name: The Lovers
achievements.description: Steal the Relic.

achievements.name: The Hermit
achievements.description: Find Alt Cunningham.

achievements.name: The Wheel of Fortune
achievements.description: Interrogate Anders Hellman.

achievements.name: The High Priestess
achievements.description: Talk with Hanako Arasaka.

achievements.name: The World
achievements.description: Complete the main storyline.

achievements.name: The Devil
achievements.description: Help Takemura avenge the death of Saburo Arasaka.

achievements.name: The Star
achievements.description: Leave Night City with the Aldecaldos.

achievements.name: The Sun
achievements.description: Become a legend of the Afterlife.

achievements.name: Temperance
achievements.description: Let Johnny Silverhand keep your body.

achievements.name: To Protect and Serve
achievements.description: Complete River Ward's storyline.

achievements.name: To Bad Decisions!
achievements.description: Complete Kerry Eurodyne's storyline.

achievements.name: Judy vs Night City
achievements.description: Complete Judy Alvarez's storyline.

achievements.name: Life of the Road
achievements.description: Complete Panam Palmer's storyline.

achievements.name: Bushido and Chill
achievements.description: Watch Bushido X with Rogue.

achievements.name: Breathtaking
achievements.description: Collect all items that once belonged to Johnny Silverhand.

achievements.name: It's Elementary
achievements.description: Complete all gigs and NCPD Scanner Hustles in Watson.

achievements.name: I Am The Law
achievements.description: Complete all Cyberpsycho Sightings.

achievements.name: Greetings from Pacifica!
achievements.description: Complete all gigs and NCPD Scanner Hustles in Pacifica.

achievements.name: The Wasteland
achievements.description: Complete all gigs and NCPD Scanner Hustles in the Badlands.

achievements.name: Little Tokyo
achievements.description: Complete all gigs and NCPD Scanner Hustles in Westbrook.

achievements.name: Mean Streets
achievements.description: Complete all gigs and NCPD Scanner Hustles in Heywood.

achievements.name: The Jungle
achievements.description: Complete all gigs and NCPD Scanner Hustles in Santo Domingo.

achievements.name: City Lights
achievements.description: Complete all gigs and NCPD Scanner Hustles in City Center.

achievements.name: Full Body Conversion
achievements.description: Install at least one implant in each system and body part.

achievements.name: Gun Fu
achievements.description: Kill or incapacitate 3 enemies in quick succession with a revolver or pistol in close combat.

achievements.name: Christmas Tree Attack
achievements.description: Complete a Breach Protocol with a minimum of 3 daemons uploaded.

achievements.name: Ten out of Ten
achievements.description: Reach the max level in any skill.

achievements.name: Gunslinger
achievements.description: Shoot an enemy grenade in midair with a revolver.

achievements.name: Two Heads, One Bullet
achievements.description: Kill or incapacitate 2 enemies with the same sniper rifle shot.

achievements.name: Rough Landing
achievements.description: While Berserk cyberware is active, perform a Superhero Landing to kill or incapacitate 2 enemies.

achievements.name: Stanislavski's Method
achievements.description: Use a dialogue option related to V's life path 10 times.

achievements.name: Autojock
achievements.description: Buy all vehicles available for purchase.

achievements.name: Master Crafter
achievements.description: Craft 3 Legendary items.

achievements.name: Daemon In The Shell
achievements.description: Kill or incapacitate 3 enemies with one "Detonate Grenade" quickhack.

achievements.name: The Quick and the Dead
achievements.description: Kill or incapacitate 50 enemies while time is slowed.

achievements.name: Must Be Rats
achievements.description: Perform the Distract Enemies quickhack 30 times without drawing attention to yourself.

achievements.name: V for Vendetta
achievements.description: After reviving with Second Heart, kill or incapacitate the enemy who killed you within 5 seconds.

achievements.name: True Soldier
achievements.description: Kill or incapacitate 300 enemies using ranged weapons.

achievements.name: True Warrior
achievements.description: Kill or incapacitate 100 enemies using melee weapons.

achievements.name: Right Back At Ya
achievements.description: Kill or incapacitate an enemy who threw a grenade at you.

achievements.name: The Wandering Fool
achievements.description: Find all the tarot graffiti for the job Fool on the Hill.

achievements.name: Frequent Flyer
achievements.description: Find all fast travel dataterms.

achievements.name: Legend of The Afterlife
achievements.description: Reach max Street Cred.
